content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• Lab (intended at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5)):
 – The agent repeatedly attempted to locate, craft, and place a Lab for supplying Automation Science Packs to support research.
 – Although multiple recovery updates were issued, the Lab was never successfully crafted or positioned due to resource and ingredient shortages.
• Smelting Facilities (pre‐existing entities):
 – Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) was used during iron plate production.
 – Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) was utilized for copper plate production.
  (Note: These furnaces were retrieved from the map rather than constructed by the agent.)

ERROR TIPS
• API Parameter Misuse:
 – When using get_entities, call the function with exactly the expected parameters. Avoid unsupported keywords like “radius” and superfluous positional arguments.
• Inventory and Placement Validation:
 – Before attempting to place an entity (e.g., a Lab), confirm that the required item is present in the inventory.
• Null-Value Handling:
 – Ensure that values returned from entity-retrieval functions are not None before iterating over them; use an empty list fallback if necessary.
• Crafting Dependency Management:
 – Verify that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels and electronic-circuits) are obtainable and that appropriate production facilities are operative.
 – Reassess the full resource dependency chain (e.g., ensuring sufficient iron-plates and copper-plates) prior to initiating advanced crafting tasks.
